timeline.bodyText: When did you get a NullPointerException for this case?
timeline.author: manusa

replies.bodyText:
When I remove this I was getting NullPointerException due to this:

  
    
      jkube/jkube-kit/config/service/src/test/java/org/eclipse/jkube/kit/config/service/kubernetes/KubernetesUndeployServiceTest.java
    
    
         Line 93
      in
      d223411
    
    
    
    

        
          
           result = new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList(new Project(), namespace, pod, service));
replies.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText:
Ok, but that's because the Test is providing an invalid Project/Namespace.
In a real-world scenario, I understand that if this happens, we shouldn't ignore it. Unless I'm wrong, receiving a Namespace/Project lacking Metadata should be a flag of something going very wrong so maybe reporting as an Exception is something we want.
With the current approach, we're simply assuming there's no namespace.
replies.author: manusa

timeline.message:
